Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-53899 affecting package python-virtualenv for versions less than 20.25.0-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-53899 affecting package python-virtualenv for versions less than 20.25.0-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-virtualenv is earlier than 20.25.0-3, affected by CVE-2024-53899
